DOC.brief_summary: A study determine whether treatment Pulmicort child effect varicella vaccine
DOC.criteria: Children age 10 month 8 year , asthma show recent sign suggest asthma , parent guardian willing comply study requirement Varicella zoster immune globulin ( VZIG ) within 5 month prior immunization , Previous varicella immunization , immunization allergy immunotherapy 4 week prior immunization , Severe asthma , another persistent lung disease , plan hospitalization duration study
